posts.post_content:
Have some graded commons available for trade or sale. Looking for EPDGs for trade as always. All of these are cross-listed on eBay.

Anyone saying I will take it will get priority. I am willing to listen to offers, especially if buying multiples.  Paypal FF or money orders. Please include $2 shipping regardless of how many you buy.

$New thread Ganzel PSA 5
$SOLD Freeman SGC 40
$SOLD Dahlen SGC 40
$SOLD Burchell PSA 2.  Nice for the grade
$SOLD Knabe SGC 30. Big Borders
$SOLD Hoblitzell SGC 20
$SOLD Jordan Batting SGC 10. Nice card for grade.

Price drop on remaining.

Help me pay for this hurricane flooding!

My first ever purchase on Net54 arrived from Texas today and I am as pleased as punch with it. Many thanks to Jeff for shipping to England the T206 card we agreed upon. Yes it's only a common but having got the 206 bug every addition to my pc is greatly treasured. I hope this will encourage other members to ship to The UK. For info the cost on the package for 1 slabbed card was $5

🇬🇧 🇺🇸
